subject: Boxing
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: United States Coach Dan Campbell retired Friday after his attempt to remake the team backfired in Beijing with its worst showing in Olympic history. Campbell, 65, a veteran of the amateur boxing ranks in Virginia Beach, Va., had been the national director of coaching for USA Boxing since 2005. The United States team had not left the Olympics with fewer than two medals since 1948, when it won one silver. The heavyweight Deontay Wilder’s bronze was the only prize for the Americans, who have won just one gold medal in the last three Olympics.
